CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( IF(INCLUDES(Product_SBU__c, "Electronic Solutions"), "Electronic Solutions;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Product_SBU__c, "Engines & Power Systems"), "Engines & Power Systems;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Product_SBU__c, "Mechanical Systems & Components"), "Mechanical Systems & Components;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Product_SBU__c, "Other Aero"), "Other Aero;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Product_SBU__c, "Services & Connectivity"), "Services & Connectivity;", NULL) + ".", ";.", NULL)
CustomField.label: Product SBU Text
